info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:00PM CDT until September 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL OLDHAM AND SOUTHWESTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Romero, or 20 miles east of Nara Visa, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Oldham and southwestern Hartley Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
